text: Configuring your CNS Mail on your iOS

steps.text: On your home screen, tap ❶ 'Safari.'
Type the following URL in ❶ and go to the registration page or scan the following QR code : ⇒https://itcsecure.sfc.keio.ac.jp/wlan/?lang=en
Type  your  CNS  login  name  in  ❶  'CNS  login  name'  and your  CNS  login  password  in ❷  'CNS  login  password.' Then, tap ❸ 'start registration.'

If this is your first time creating a personal certificate, select 'Issue' in ❶ and tap ❷ 'go.' New students have already issued a personal certificate at the time of CNS account pre-registration, so select 'Download' and move on to STEP 06. If you have already issued your personal certifi cate and the certificate is still valid, select 'Download' in ❶ , tap ❷ 'Submit', and skip to STEP 06. If your certifi cate has expired, select 'Reissue' in ❶ and tap ❷ 'go.' If you select 'Reissue,' your previous certificate will be invalidated.

You can confirm the expiration date of your certifi cate by following the instructions at the following site. Once the expiration date has passed, you will not be able to connect to the campus wireless LAN, so you will need to delete the old certificate and reissue a new one. For more details, please refer the website below.
⇒ Procedure to reissue new certificate

Make  a  new  passphrase  for  your  personal  certificate. This  password  is  necessary  to  protect  your  personal certificate  from  unauthorized  use.  It  must  contain  at least  8  characters.  Enter  your  passphrase  to ❶・❷,  and tap ❸  'Issue  the  personal  certifi cate.'  This  passphrase will be used in STEP 18.
Tap ❶ 'Download' in Profile (C)
The  dialog  box  shown  on  the  left  side  will  appear.  Tap ❶'Allow.'
Tap ❶ 'Close.'
On your home screen, tap ❶ 'Settings.'
If  ❶ 'Profile  Downloaded'  is  displayed,  tap  it  and  go  on to STEP 13.
If  'Profile  Downloaded'  is  not  displayed  in  Settings,  tap ❶'General.'
Tap ❶ 'Profiles.'
The  downloaded  profi le  will  be  displayed.  Tap  the  ❶ Profile.
Tap ❶ 'Install.'
Tap ❶ 'Install.'
Tap ❶ 'Install.'
Type your iOS device passcode.
Type  your  personal  certificate  passphrase  from  STEP  05 in ❶ and tap ❷ 'Next.'
Type  your  IMAP/SMTP-AUTH  password  in ❶  and  tap ❷ 'Next.'
Tap ❶ 'Done.'

On your home screen, tap ❶ 'Mail' and make sure a new mailbox is added to your iOS device.

Configuring Your CNS Mail on Your iOS Device is completed.

* The new personal certificate may not be installed properly if you have older profiles installed. Make sure to delete any older SFC-CNS profiles first, then try again if you encounter problems.
